main_definition: Leisure refers to free time or the activities done during this time, which are not obligatory.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Time without work, duties, and other responsibilities.
meanings_and_examples.example: After finishing her job, she enjoys her leisurely weekends at home.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Recreational activities or hobbies done during free time.
meanings_and_examples.example: He spends his leisure time painting and reading books.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A period of rest, relaxation, and enjoyment after work or daily chores.
meanings_and_examples.example: During her vacation, she indulged in various forms of leisure such as swimming, hiking, and sightseeing.

meanings_and_examples.definition: The state or quality of being free from occupation or burdens; unoccupied time.
meanings_and_examples.example: Having no obligations at the moment, he found himself in a state of pure leisure.
